Class Connector

  • java.lang.Object
    • Connector
  • public class Connector
extends java.lang.Object
    This program allows access to the AirportDB database.
    Author:
    Lior Daniel and Israel Buskila.

      void matalaPartASolution()
      This function allows the user to enter the query request from the database.

      Answer to question 1, In response to user input : "flights".

      void setConnection()
      This function initializes the connection with the AirportDB database and allows the user to request queries.

    • Method Detail

      • setConnection

        public void setConnection()
        This function initializes the connection with the AirportDB database and allows the user to request queries.

      • matalaPartASolution

        public void matalaPartASolution()
        This function allows the user to enter the query request from the database.

      • Q1

        public java.lang.String Q1()
        Answer to question 1, In response to user input : "flights". This function shows in the console all the flight numbers that depart today, where they arrive and the flight hours.
        Returns:
        string.

      • Q3

        public java.lang.String Q3​(int id)
        Answer to question 3, In response to user input included only digits. This function displays in the console the number of flights in the last year of a passenger according to his / her ID.
        Parameters:
        id - - passenger id.
        Returns:
        string.

      • Q4

        public org.json.JSONObject Q4()
        Answer to question 4, In response to user input : "airports". This function will show in JSON configuration, all the airports that can be reached from Ben-Gurion, flight number, date and arrival time.
        Returns:
        string.

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
